Posts.Content: mec33 wrote: I have recently been concerned about what is going on with my breasts. a couple weeks ago my boyfriend gave me a hickey that was located on my breast, next to it was this little round bruise. I thought that it was part of the hickey and just ignored it. later on, the hickey finally disappeared, leaving the bruise still there. I was looking in the mirror and found another small bruise, where no one has touched or tampered with. I am only 17 years old and am really concerned. but afraid to bring it up to anyone nothing. and I don't want to worry anyone. any help would be appreciated. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: 2 bruises found on left breast mec33 Moderators
